sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_082c628a97a311103539b846f053af5f
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>GetIncidentFields</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

	var recordObj = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
	recordObj.addQuery("name", "incident");
	var grOR = recordObj.addQuery("element", "urgency");
	grOR.addOrCondition('element', "impact");
	recordObj.query();
	
	var responseArray = new Array();
	while(recordObj.next()) {
		responseArray.push({
			label: recordObj.getValue("label"),
			value: recordObj.getValue("value"),
			element: recordObj.getValue("element"),
		});
	}
	response.setBody(responseArray);
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_830655_mm_std/getincidentfields</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-12-05 09:31:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>082c628a97a311103539b846f053af5f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetIncidentFields</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications" source="x_830655_mm_std">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_082c628a97a311103539b846f053af5f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-12-05 10:16:03</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GetIncidentFields">48eb228297a311103539b846f053aff2</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_6018666a2ff7811063df52172799b69d
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>x_830655_mm_std.problem_changed</event_name><name>ServiceNow for MM Problem Notify</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[gs.info("Running ServiceNow for Mattermost script for problem subcription - " + event.parm1 + " and id -" + current.getValue("sys_id"));

var serviceNowForMattermostUtils = new ServiceNowForMattermostUtils();

// get valid bulk alert subscriptions
var bulkSubscriptions = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.getBulkAlertsSubscriptions(current, event.parm1);
while (bulkSubscriptions.next()) { 
	var filters = bulkSubscriptions.getValue("filters");
	if (filters && !serviceNowForMattermostUtils.getFilteredSubscriptions(filters, current)){
		continue;
	}
	
	// call endpoint to send bulk subscriptions
	var bulkNotificationRecord = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.getMattermostNotificationRecord(bulkSubscriptions, current, event.parm1);
	gs.info("Calling Mattermost Api to send bulk subscriptions for record - " + JSON.stringify(bulkNotificationRecord));
	var response = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.sendMattermostNotification(bulkNotificationRecord);
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-03 12:19:00</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6018666a2ff7811063df52172799b69d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceNow for MM Problem Notify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications" source="x_830655_mm_std">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_6018666a2ff7811063df52172799b69d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-01-16 06:25:36</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_baa850ce2fb3011063df52172799b603
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_830655_mm_std.ServiceNowForMattermostUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>This utility class will have methods used across various script actions e.g. calling external endpoints, common database calls, etc.</description><name>ServiceNowForMattermostUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var ServiceNowForMattermostUtils = Class.create();
ServiceNowForMattermostUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	getBulkAlertsSubscriptions: function(record, subscriptionType) {
		var subscriptions = new GlideRecord('x_830655_mm_std_servicenow_for_mattermost_subscriptions'); 
		subscriptions.addQuery('record_type', record.sys_class_name);
		subscriptions.addQuery('subscription_events', 'CONTAINS', subscriptionType);
		subscriptions.addQuery('type', "object");
		subscriptions.addQuery('is_active', true);
		subscriptions.query(); 
		return subscriptions;
	},
	
	getRecordAlertsSubscriptions: function(recordType, subscriptionType, recordId) {
		var subscriptions = new GlideRecord('x_830655_mm_std_servicenow_for_mattermost_subscriptions'); 
		subscriptions.addQuery('record_type', recordType);
		subscriptions.addQuery('subscription_events', 'CONTAINS', subscriptionType);
		subscriptions.addQuery('type', "record");
		subscriptions.addQuery('record_id', recordId);
		subscriptions.addQuery('is_active', true);
		subscriptions.query(); 
		return subscriptions;
	},
	
	getFilteredSubscriptions: function(filters, current) {
		var FILTERS = new ServiceNowForMattermostConstants().getSupportedFilters();
		for(var i = 0; i < FILTERS.length; i++) {
			var filterValue = '"' + FILTERS[i] + '":"' + current.getValue(FILTERS[i]) + '"';
			if (filters.includes(FILTERS[i]) && !filters.includes(filterValue)) {
				return false;
			}
		}

		return true;
	},
	
	getMattermostNotificationRecord: function(subscriptions, current, eventOccured) {
		var record = {
			sys_id: subscriptions.getValue("sys_id"), // subsription_id
			record_id: current.getValue("sys_id"), // record type sys id
			server_url: subscriptions.getValue("server_url"),
			number: current.getValue("number"),
			short_description: current.getValue("short_description"),
			description: current.getValue("description"),
			state: current.getDisplayValue("state"),
			priority: current.getDisplayValue("priority"),
			assigned_to: current.getDisplayValue("assigned_to"),
			assignment_group: current.getDisplayValue("assignment_group"),
			service: current.getDisplayValue("business_service"),
			record_type: subscriptions.getValue("record_type"),
			record_type_name: current.sys_class_name.getDisplayValue(),
			subscription_events: subscriptions.getValue("subscription_events"),
			event_occurred: eventOccured.toString(),
			type: subscriptions.getValue("type"),
			mm_channel_id: subscriptions.getValue("channel_id"),
			mm_user_id: subscriptions.getValue("user_id"),
		};
		return record;
	},
	
	sendMattermostNotification: function(record) {
		var response = null;
		// get the api key
		var notificationsAuth = new GlideRecord('x_830655_mm_std_servicenow_for_mattermost_notifications_auth'); 
		var apiSecretExists = notificationsAuth.get('server_url', record.server_url);

		if (apiSecretExists) {
			var mmNotifyRestMessage = new sn_ws.RESTMessageV2();
			mmNotifyRestMessage.setEndpoint(notificationsAuth.server_url + '/plugins/mattermost-plugin-servicenow/api/v1/notification');
			mmNotifyRestMessage.setHttpMethod('post');
			mmNotifyRestMessage.setRequestHeader('Content-Type',"application/json");
			mmNotifyRestMessage.setRequestHeader("User-Agent", "ServiceNow");
			mmNotifyRestMessage.setRequestBody(JSON.stringify(record));
			mmNotifyRestMessage.setQueryParameter("secret", notificationsAuth.api_secret);
			try {
				response = mmNotifyRestMessage.execute();
				gs.info("Response status - " + response.getStatusCode() + " from endpoint for record - " +
						JSON.stringify(record));
			} catch(error) {
				gs.error("Error calling Mattermost Api for record - " + JSON.stringify(record), error);
			}
		} else {
			gs.info("Discarding Request as user has not authenticated app for record - " + JSON.stringify(record));
		}	
		
		return response;
	},
	
    type: 'ServiceNowForMattermostUtils'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-01 12:44:46</sys_created_on><sys_id>baa850ce2fb3011063df52172799b603</sys_id><sys_mod_count>166</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceNowForMattermostUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications" source="x_830655_mm_std">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_baa850ce2fb3011063df52172799b603</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-01-16 06:25:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_724c90822ff3011063df52172799b6c5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>incident</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>ServiceNow for MM Incident Events</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var incidentEvent = "x_830655_mm_std.incident_changed";
	var EVENT_NAMES = new ServiceNowForMattermostConstants().getEventNames();
	
	// handle when incident is created
	if (current.operation() == 'insert') {
		gs.eventQueue(incidentEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.created, gs.getUserID());
	}
	
	// handle when incident state is changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.state.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(incidentEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.state, current.state);
	}
	
	// handle when incident priority is changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.priority.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(incidentEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.priority, current.priority);
	}

	// handle when incident is commented
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.comments.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(incidentEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.commented, gs.getUserID());
	}
	
	// handle when incident Assignment Group changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.assignment_group.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(incidentEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.assignmentGroup, gs.getUserID());
	}
	
	// handle when incident Assignee changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.assigned_to.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(incidentEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.assignedTo, gs.getUserID());
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-01 12:55:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>724c90822ff3011063df52172799b6c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceNow for MM Incident Events</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications" source="x_830655_mm_std">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_724c90822ff3011063df52172799b6c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-01 12:55:36</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=724c90822ff3011063df52172799b6c5"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_eab99dda2f37411063df52172799b6e7
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>x_830655_mm_std.task_changed</event_name><name>ServiceNow for MM Task Notify</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[gs.info("Running ServiceNow for Mattermost script for task - " + current.sys_class_name.getDisplayValue() + " and subcription - " + event.parm1 + " and record id -" + current.getValue("sys_id"));

var serviceNowForMattermostUtils = new ServiceNowForMattermostUtils();

// get valid record alert subscriptions
var recordSubscriptions = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.getRecordAlertsSubscriptions(current.sys_class_name, event.parm1, current.getValue("sys_id"));
while (recordSubscriptions.next()) { 
	// call endpoint to send record level subscriptions
	var notificationRecord = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.getMattermostNotificationRecord(recordSubscriptions, current, event.parm1);
	gs.info("Calling Mattermost Api to send record level subscriptions for record - " + JSON.stringify(notificationRecord));
	var recordResponse = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.sendMattermostNotification(notificationRecord);
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-02 12:00:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>eab99dda2f37411063df52172799b6e7</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceNow for MM Task Notify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications" source="x_830655_mm_std">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_eab99dda2f37411063df52172799b6e7</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-07-22 10:43:20</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_3a39eaaa2ff7811063df52172799b609
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="DELETE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>x_830655_mm_std.problem_changed</event_name><name>ServiceNow for MM Problem Notify</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[gs.info("Running ServiceNow for Mattermost script for problem subcription - " + event.parm1 + " and id -" + current.getValue("sys_id"));

var serviceNowForMattermostUtils = new ServiceNowForMattermostUtils();

// get valid bulk alert subscriptions
var bulkSubscriptions = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.getBulkAlertsSubscriptions(current.sys_class_name, event.parm1);
while (bulkSubscriptions.next()) { 
	// call endpoint to send bulk subscriptions
	var bulkNotificationRecord = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.getMattermostNotificationRecord(bulkSubscriptions, current);
	gs.info("Calling Mattermost Api to send bulk subscriptions for record - " + JSON.stringify(bulkNotificationRecord));
	var response = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.sendMattermostNotification(bulkNotificationRecord);
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-03 12:23:20</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>3a39eaaa2ff7811063df52172799b609</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceNow for MM Problem Notify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications" source="x_830655_mm_std">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_3a39eaaa2ff7811063df52172799b609</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-03 12:23:20</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_e8e7924b2f40111063df52172799b6c5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>change_request</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>ServiceNow for MM Change Req Events</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var changeRequestEvent = "x_830655_mm_std.change_request_changed";
	var EVENT_NAMES = new ServiceNowForMattermostConstants().getEventNames();

	// handle when change request is created
	if (current.operation() == 'insert') {
		gs.eventQueue(changeRequestEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.created, gs.getUserID());
	}
	
	// handle when change request state is changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.state.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(changeRequestEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.state, current.state);
	}
	
	// handle when change request priority is changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.priority.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(changeRequestEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.priority, current.priority);
	}

	// handle when change request is commented
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.comments.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(changeRequestEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.commented, gs.getUserID());
	}
	
	// handle when change request's Assignment Group changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.assignment_group.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(changeRequestEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.assignmentGroup, gs.getUserID());
	}
	
	// handle when change request Assignee changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.assigned_to.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(changeRequestEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.assignedTo, gs.getUserID());
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-17 10:42:18</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>e8e7924b2f40111063df52172799b6c5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceNow for MM Change Req Events</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications" source="x_830655_mm_std">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_e8e7924b2f40111063df52172799b6c5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-17 10:42:18</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=e8e7924b2f40111063df52172799b6c5"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_148a199e2f37411063df52172799b678
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="DELETE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>x_830655_mm_std.task_changed</event_name><name>ServiceNow for MM Task Notify</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[gs.info("Running ServiceNow for Mattermost script for task - " + current.sys_class_name.getDisplayValue() + " and subcription - " + event.parm1 + " and record id -" + current.getValue("sys_id"));

var serviceNowForMattermostUtils = new ServiceNowForMattermostUtils();

// get valid record alert subscriptions
var recordSubscriptions = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.getRecordAlertsSubscriptions(current.sys_class_name, event.parm1, current.getValue("sys_id"));
while (recordSubscriptions.next()) { 
	// call endpoint to send record level subscriptions
	var notificationRecord = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.getMattermostNotificationRecord(recordSubscriptions, current);
	gs.info("Calling Mattermost Api to send record level subscriptions for record - " + JSON.stringify(notificationRecord));
	var recordResponse = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.sendMattermostNotification(notificationRecord);
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-02 12:01:12</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>148a199e2f37411063df52172799b678</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceNow for MM Task Notify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications" source="x_830655_mm_std">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_148a199e2f37411063df52172799b678</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-02 12:01:12</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_cb0b55122f77411063df52172799b661
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>task</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>ServiceNow for MM Task Notify</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var taskEvent = "x_830655_mm_std.task_changed";
	var EVENT_NAMES = new ServiceNowForMattermostConstants().getEventNames();
	
	// handle when task state is changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.state.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(taskEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.state, current.state);
	}
	
	// handle when task priority is changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.priority.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(taskEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.priority, current.priority);
	}

	// handle when task is commented
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.comments.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(taskEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.commented, gs.getUserID());
	}
	
	
	// handle when task's Assignment Group changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.assignment_group.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(taskEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.assignmentGroup, gs.getUserID());
	}
	
	// handle when task Assignee changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.assigned_to.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(taskEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.assignedTo, gs.getUserID());
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-02 12:06:05</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>cb0b55122f77411063df52172799b661</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceNow for MM Task Notify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications" source="x_830655_mm_std">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_cb0b55122f77411063df52172799b661</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-02 12:06:05</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=cb0b55122f77411063df52172799b661"/></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_4873e7d4476211103675690cd36d4320
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>GetStates</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

	var allowedRecordTypes = ["incident", "problem", "change_request", "task", "change_task"];
    var recordType = request.pathParams.record_type;
	
	if(allowedRecordTypes.indexOf(recordType) == -1) {
		response.setError(new sn_ws_err.BadRequestError("record_type not supported"));
		return;
	}
	
	var recordObj = new GlideRecord('sys_choice');
	recordObj.addQuery("name", recordType);
	recordObj.addQuery("element", "state");
	recordObj.query();
	
	var responseArray = new Array();
	while(recordObj.next()) {
		responseArray.push({
			label: recordObj.getValue("label"),
			value: recordObj.getValue("value"),
		});
	}
	response.setBody(responseArray);
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_830655_mm_std/getstates/{record_type}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/{record_type}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-10-11 10:05:31</sys_created_on><sys_id>4873e7d4476211103675690cd36d4320</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetStates</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications" source="x_830655_mm_std">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_4873e7d4476211103675690cd36d4320</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-10-11 11:31:49</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GetStates">ee322794476211103675690cd36d435d</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_c4a85a4b2f40111063df52172799b625
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>x_830655_mm_std.change_request_changed</event_name><name>ServiceNow for MM Change Req Notify</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[gs.info("Running ServiceNow for Mattermost script for change request subcription - " + event.parm1 + " and id -" + current.getValue("sys_id"));

var serviceNowForMattermostUtils = new ServiceNowForMattermostUtils();

// get valid bulk alert subscriptions
var bulkSubscriptions = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.getBulkAlertsSubscriptions(current, event.parm1);
while (bulkSubscriptions.next()) { 
	var filters = bulkSubscriptions.getValue("filters");
	if (filters && !serviceNowForMattermostUtils.getFilteredSubscriptions(filters, current)){
		continue;
	}

	// call endpoint to send bulk subscriptions
	var bulkNotificationRecord = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.getMattermostNotificationRecord(bulkSubscriptions, current, event.parm1);
	gs.info("Calling Mattermost Api to send bulk subscriptions for record - " + JSON.stringify(bulkNotificationRecord));
	var response = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.sendMattermostNotification(bulkNotificationRecord);
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-17 10:45:12</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c4a85a4b2f40111063df52172799b625</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceNow for MM Change Req Notify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications" source="x_830655_mm_std">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_c4a85a4b2f40111063df52172799b625</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-01-16 06:24:14</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_17726fa747d02110442b84d7536d4361
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>GetTableFields</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    var queryParams = request.queryParams; 
    var table = queryParams.table;
    var tableName = new GlideRecord(table);
    tableName.initialize();
    var fields = tableName.getElements(); 
    var fieldsList = [];

    for (var i = 0; i < fields.length; i++) {
        var glideElement = fields[i];
        var descriptor = glideElement.getED();

        var fldName = glideElement.getName().toString();
        var fldLabel = descriptor.getLabel().toString();
        var fldType = descriptor.getInternalType().toString();
		var isChoice = descriptor.isChoiceTable();
        var canWrite = glideElement.canWrite();

		fieldsList.push({
			name: fldName,
			type: fldType,
			label: fldLabel,
			isChoice: isChoice,
			writable: canWrite
		});     

    }

    return fieldsList;


})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_830655_mm_std/get_table_fields</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-01-16 11:50:59</sys_created_on><sys_id>17726fa747d02110442b84d7536d4361</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetTableFields</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications" source="x_830655_mm_std">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_17726fa747d02110442b84d7536d4361</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-01-16 11:57:14</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="GetTableFields">faa0a36747d02110442b84d7536d43e6</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sysevent_script_action_b8a6389e2fb3411063df52172799b630
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sysevent_script_action"><sysevent_script_action action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><condition_script/><description/><event_name>x_830655_mm_std.incident_changed</event_name><name>ServiceNow for MM Incident Notify</name><order>100</order><script><![CDATA[gs.info("Running ServiceNow for Mattermost script for incident subcription - " + event.parm1 + " and id -" + current.getValue("sys_id"));

var serviceNowForMattermostUtils = new ServiceNowForMattermostUtils();

// get valid bulk alert subscriptions
var bulkSubscriptions = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.getBulkAlertsSubscriptions(current, event.parm1);

while (bulkSubscriptions.next()) { 
	var filters = bulkSubscriptions.getValue("filters");
	if (filters && !serviceNowForMattermostUtils.getFilteredSubscriptions(filters, current)){
		continue;
	}
	
	// call endpoint to send bulk subscriptions
	var bulkNotificationRecord = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.getMattermostNotificationRecord(bulkSubscriptions, current, event.parm1);

	gs.info("Calling Mattermost Api to send bulk subscriptions for record - " + JSON.stringify(bulkNotificationRecord));
	var response = serviceNowForMattermostUtils.sendMattermostNotification(bulkNotificationRecord);
}]]></script><synchronous>false</synchronous><sys_class_name>sysevent_script_action</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-02 09:27:18</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>b8a6389e2fb3411063df52172799b630</sys_id><sys_mod_count>44</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceNow for MM Incident Notify</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications" source="x_830655_mm_std">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysevent_script_action_b8a6389e2fb3411063df52172799b630</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-01-16 06:24:00</sys_updated_on></sysevent_script_action></record_update>

ServiceNowForMattermostConstants.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	getEventNames: function() {
		var EVENT_NAMES = {
			created: "created",
			state: "state",
			priority: "priority",
			commented: "commented",
			updated: "updated",
			assignedTo: "assigned_to",
			assignmentGroup: "assignment_group"
		};
		return EVENT_NAMES;	
	},
	
	getSupportedFilters: function() {
		var FILTERS = ["business_service", "assignment_group"];
		return FILTERS;	
	},
	
    type: 'ServiceNowForMattermostConstants'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-01 12:32:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>fc979c8e2fb3011063df52172799b622</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceNowForMattermostConstants</sys_name><sys_package display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications" source="x_830655_mm_std">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_fc979c8e2fb3011063df52172799b622</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-01-11 12:56:37</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_c757226a2ff7811063df52172799b62a
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>problem</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition/><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>ServiceNow for MM Problem Events</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var problemEvent = "x_830655_mm_std.problem_changed";
	var EVENT_NAMES = new ServiceNowForMattermostConstants().getEventNames();

	// handle when problem is created
	if (current.operation() == 'insert') {
		gs.eventQueue(problemEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.created, gs.getUserID());
	}
	
	// handle when problem state is changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.state.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(problemEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.state, current.state);
	}
	
	// handle when problem priority is changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.priority.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(problemEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.priority, current.priority);
	}

	// handle when problem is commented
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.comments.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(problemEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.commented, gs.getUserID());
	}
	// handle when problem Assignment Group changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.assignment_group.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(problemEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.assignmentGroup, gs.getUserID());
	}
	
	// handle when problem Assignee changed
	if (current.operation() != 'insert' && current.assigned_to.changes()) {
		gs.eventQueue(problemEvent, current, EVENT_NAMES.assignedTo, gs.getUserID());
	}

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-06-03 12:17:16</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>c757226a2ff7811063df52172799b62a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>ServiceNow for MM Problem Events</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications" source="x_830655_mm_std">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="ServiceNow for Mattermost Notifications">d8e8fb312f73011063df52172799b6f2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_c757226a2ff7811063df52172799b62a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2022-06-03 12:17:16</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=c757226a2ff7811063df52172799b62a"/></record_update>
